info.title: CLOB API
info.description: Endpoints for interacting with central limit order book (CLOB) pricing and spread data.

post.description: Bans a user account, optionally cascading to related entities when requested.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Internal identifier of the user to ban.

parameters.name: cascade
parameters.description: When true, bans all accounts linked to the user (by referrer_id).

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin API credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

400.description: Malformed cascade query parameter (must be a boolean).

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

404.description: No user found for the provided identifier.

get.description: Returns admin-visible user records with wallet details and API key metadata.

parameters.name: wallet
parameters.description: Filter by wallet address (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Filter to the user owning the supplied API key UUID.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Filter by user role (`fork`, `client`, or `admin`).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by user status (`active`, `inactive`, or `banned`).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index used with `limit`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Page size between 1 and 1000 (defaults to 1000).

200.description: Matching users and their API keys.

400.description: Invalid query parameter (for example, non-UUID `key`, invalid `page`, or out-of-range `limit`).

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

post.description: Pauses a condition so new orders stop being accepted.

parameters.name: condition_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the condition to target.

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin API credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

post.description: Resumes a condition so new orders are accepted again.

parameters.name: condition_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the condition to target.

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin API credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

post.description: Clears resting orders for a paused condition, marking them as cancelled or partially filled.

parameters.name: condition_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the condition to target.

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin API credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

204.description: Clearing completed; open orders marked cancelled and partial fills retained.

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

post.description: Lists conditions with aggregate statistics for admin review.

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin API credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

200.description: Condition summaries for the requested page.

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

post.description: Activates the global circuit breaker, preventing new orders.

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin API credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

204.description: System pause recorded; no content returned.

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

post.description: Turns off the global circuit breaker, allowing new orders.

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin API credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

get.description: Returns the current state of the global circuit breaker.

parameters.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
parameters.description: Wallet address associated with the admin credentials.

parameters.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
parameters.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the request.

parameters.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

parameters.name: KUEST_API_KEY
parameters.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

parameters.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
parameters.description: 64-character passphrase paired with the API key.

401.description: Missing or invalid L2 authentication headers.

parameters.name: token_id
parameters.description: Token identifier to inspect.

200.description: Most recent trade price for the token.

parameters.name: token_id
parameters.description: Token identifier.

200.description: Spread between best ask and best bid.

get.summary: Check if an order is scoring (L2)

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Order identifier to check.

chain_id.description: EVM chain ID associated with the key.

nonce.description: Current nonce value for signature replay protection.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the key was created.

revoked_at.description: Timestamp when the key was revoked, if applicable.

last_used_at.description: Most recent usage timestamp for the key.

wallet.description: Primary wallet address for the user.

role.description: Role assigned to the user (`fork`, `client`, or `admin`).

referrer_id.description: Upstream referrer user ID when present.

keys.description: API keys registered to the user (newest first).

condition_ids.description: List of condition IDs to include. Empty strings are ignored.

token_ids.description: List of token IDs to match against associated conditions.

limit.description: Page size between 1 and 1000. Defaults to `1000`.

trade_count.description: Total trades associated with the condition.

total_buy_maker_amount.description: Aggregate maker amount for buy orders (stringified integer).

total_buy_taker_amount.description: Aggregate taker amount for buy orders (stringified integer).

total_sell_maker_amount.description: Aggregate maker amount for sell orders (stringified integer).

total_sell_taker_amount.description: Aggregate taker amount for sell orders (stringified integer).

page.description: Echo of the requested page index.

items.description: Condition summaries for the current page.

reason.description: Optional reason recorded with the system pause. Trimmed; empty strings ignored.

paused.description: Whether the global circuit breaker is enabled.

reason.description: Optional message recorded with the pause.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the status last changed (UTC).

price.description: Last traded price formatted as a string.

side.description: Side of the most recent aggressor.

scoring.description: Whether the order is currently scoring.

OrdersScoringResponse.description: Map of order IDs to scoring status.

KuestAddress.name: KUEST_ADDRESS
KuestAddress.description: Wallet address associated with the L2 credentials.

KuestApiKey.name: KUEST_API_KEY
KuestApiKey.description: API key identifier issued via L2 credential flow.

KuestPassphrase.name: KUEST_PASSPHRASE
KuestPassphrase.description: 64-character passphrase used with the API key.

KuestTimestamp.name: KUEST_TIMESTAMP
KuestTimestamp.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) matching the signed payload.

KuestSignatureL2.name: KUEST_SIGNATURE
KuestSignatureL2.description: EIP-712 signature authorizing the L2 request.
